subject: This is Mrs Cheryl Pierce Vige
body:
This is Mrs Cheryl Pierce Viger , the U.S Postmaster General. I want to bring to
your Notice that, on my routine Monthly investigation of every USPS
Office visiting, i discovered an abandoned Parcel containing an ATM
Card worth of IS ($450, 000.00) in one of our offices. And when i made
inquiry of the reason it has not been mailed for the owner,
 i
discovered that the mailing information on the Parcel is not complete,
as the mailing information written on the form is just your name and
email address
, as the Beneficiary only, no mailing address on it. The
Postmaster in that branch (Mr. Bernard Coleman) fail to mail it as
programmed, due to the incorrect information.
I have made the arrangement of mailing the ATM Card Parcel to you. So,
I'm sending you this message to get back with your current mailing
address to enable us to mail it for you.
Now, i want to mail the ATM Card Parcel for you by myself as i have
made the arrangement of mailing it to you. I discussed it with the
White House and all Homeland Securities including FBI and they have
all given me the go head order to mail it for you immediately, you
reconfirm your mailing address to this office in order for us to mail
the ATM Card directly to you after sending the mailing fee which is
ust US$50.
Note, below is the officially information needed for posting of the
ATM CARD ASAP.
Full name:_____
Full mailing Address:_____
Your cell phone no:_____
Nationality:____
ID card copy
:___
We shall mail the ATM Card for you once you update us with the above
information and 
the Postal Stamp fee of US$ only via BTC or Steam Wallet card
US$50 or Apple  Gift Card of US$50
 as a matter of
rgency and Deliver you.
Best Regards,
Mrs Cheryl Pierce Viger

subject: Re: This is Mrs Cheryl Pierce Vige
body:
Hello Mrs Cheryl Pierce Viger,

Wow, that's quite a surprise! I had no idea there was an ATM card waiting for me. It's really kind of you to take the time to inform me about this. 

I'm curious though, how did my name and email address end up on the parcel? And why would it be sent via USPS? I don't remember expecting any ATM cards.

Also, could you please explain more about the Postal Stamp fee? Why is it necessary and why does it need to be paid through BTC or Steam Wallet card or Apple Gift Card?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Christa
